description: Unique independent villa BRAND NEW in the Urbanization "Las CUMBRES! This magnificent rustic-style detached house is being built on a plot of approximately 508 m2, it is 90 percent complete. The house is distributed as follows: - Basement: garage for two cars and access through the first floor house. - First floor: porch or terrace where you can enjoy the sunset, entrance hall, independent kitchen fully tiled and with water intakes with lateral access to the garden, large living room with a ceiling that will be covered with wooden beams and large fixed window with beautiful views of the Sierra, 3 bedrooms and two full bathrooms (one en suite with a shower and the other shared by two other bedrooms with a bathtub). This chalet is located in a quiet and well-connected area, near the bus stop and has a wide range of shops and services within walking distance (children's, public and private schools, schools, health center and a large number of shops. With direct access to the M-608 and one hour from Madrid. Regular transportation to Plaza Castilla. At Grupocasa10, a real estate services company with more than 15 years of experience and knowledge of the sector in the Sierra Norte area, we have a team of professionals with superior training and experience in personal advice, which allows us to offer excellent management and find solutions to the needs of each client to achieve their trust and satisfaction. We help you find the most profitable financing. WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER. Do not miss this opportunity, you will love it! GROUP CASA 10; GUADALIX DE LA SIERRA REF. 150158.

At Grupo Casa 10 we are proud to sell this beautiful apartment located in a private urbanization with a community pool and garden areas. This bright 130m2 property has a spacious living-dining room, a kitchen furnished and equipped with high-end appliances, a private terrace and 3 cozy bedrooms with built-in wardrobes. All rooms in the house are very spacious and cozy. In addition, it has 2 full bathrooms, an individual and closed garage, ceramic stoneware and parquet floors, tilt-and-turn PVC windows with double glazing, individual natural gas heating and a mixed condensation boiler. The apartment is located in a very quiet area and very well connected, with all nearby services such as supermarkets, bus stops, medical center and schools. Urbanization of 19 neighbors with community pool. Do not miss the opportunity to live in this wonderful apartment. Come visit it! Reference 200132 Group House 10; Guadalix de la Sierra Camino de las Hazas.

Splendid semi-new semi-detached house. It is a large house of 215 m3, with two floors above ground within a plot of 311 m2. Built in 2005, it is made with top quality materials, as well as finished with care and precision. It has a successful distribution that makes it very comfortable, on the ground floor there is a wonderful 38 m2 living room, well connected on the one hand to the hall leading to the home, on the other to the garden (through the porch), and on the other hand linked to a large kitchen, through a double sliding door. In addition, the floor is completed with a practical multipurpose room (or bedroom), along with a bathroom with a shower, and a garage with an automatic door. On the upper floor there are three bedrooms that stand out for their good dimensions (all with built-in wardrobes), and two full bathrooms with a shower, also of generous dimensions. The house is very well equipped, it has efficient windows (thermal break and double glazed windows), it has hot/cold air equipment installed (new) in the living room and bedrooms, in the living room it has a pellet fireplace with a fully integrated cassette, It has a gas boiler (new) for heating and domestic hot water. For all this, and also for its luminosity, it is a particularly comfortable home, ready to enter and enjoy from the first day without the need for any investment.

Beautiful house in Guadalix de la Sierra Beautiful independent villa of traditional construction with stone walls and Tyrolean facade, on a plot of about 740 m2. and located in an excellent gated community in Guadalix de la Sierra. It is distributed on two floors. The main floor consists of a spacious living room with fireplace, kitchen, four bedrooms, two bathrooms and an attractive terrace from which you can enjoy fantastic views. The ground floor offers a multipurpose room with a fireplace, a garage for two cars, a bathroom, an outbuilding converted into a workshop and a boiler room. Attached to the plot there is another magnificent plot of about 1,600 m2. which offers a magnificent swimming pool of about 76 m2. and that is also available for sale. The municipality of Guadalix de la Sierra is integrated in the region of the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares and limits the North with the municipalities of Bustarviejo, Navalafuente and Cabanillas of the Sierra; to the South with Colmenar Viejo; To the East with Venturada, El Vellón and Pedrezuela; and to the west with Miraflores of the Sierra. Guadalix, is located about 60 kilometers from Madrid capital. It has a population of 5,982 inhabitants, which in summer times, multiplies considerably. The most representative monuments of its heritage architectural are The church of San Juan Bautista, the building the Town Hall and the Hermitage of the Virgen del Espinar. Guadalix also offers a deep contact with the nature. Its main riverbed is the Guadalix river, whose waters have been dammed in the Pedrezuela reservoir. Because of its location in the valley, Guadalix de la Sierra enjoys a characteristic microclimate, with winters not too cold and summers with mild temperatures. It communicates with the capital by the A-1 and by the M-607 of Colmenar Viejo and has regular bus lines that communicate with Madrid and with the neighboring municipalities.

Charming town house for sale in Guadalix de la Sierra, north of Madrid. This property, built of stone and located in the urban area, offers a unique opportunity to create the home of your dreams. suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Semi-detached house in Calle Encinas, Tilos y Sauces no number'}
description: Discover your ideal home in -ARROYO HOMES, an exquisite new construction real estate development that consists of 16 chalets, SEMI-DETACHED AND INDEPENDENT, in the idyllic surroundings of Guadalix de la Sierra. Strategically located at the foot of the imposing Madrid mountain range and just a 5-minute walk from the heart of Guadalix, these chalets offer a harmonious mix of natural beauty and urban comforts. Each of the 16 chalets is built on generous private plots of more than 300 m2, whether semi-detached or independent.These homes have been designed to adapt to all stages of your life with 4 large bedrooms, among which a versatile room on the ground floor stands out, ideal for a study or bedroom, and 3 full bathrooms (one of them on the ground floor ), At Arroyo Homes, we value your autonomy and comfort, which is why individual regulation is present on both the ground and first floors, allowing you to personalize the climate of each space according to your preferences. The dual-flow mechanical interior ventilation is another notable feature, ensuring a healthy and fresh environment at all times.This innovative system renews the air efficiently, filtering impurities and guaranteeing optimal air quality for you and your family. Heating and domestic hot water (DHW) are managed in an innovative way through aerothermal energy, a technology that uses the energy of the air to guarantee optimal performance with minimal impact.In addition, enjoy unmatched comfort with underfloor heating and cooling, a solution that adapts to climatic variations to offer you the perfect temperature in each season. But what really makes ARROYO HOMES special- is its unique connection with nature.Immerse yourself in the serenity of more than 1,600 m2 of garden areas, enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool or let your children have fun in the children's area.Here, everyday life merges with the natural essence, creating an environment where stress dissipates and tranquility prevails. Arroyo Homes is not just a home, it is a lifestyle where elegance meets functionality and nature intertwines with comfort.At Arroyo Homes you will find a home full of charm surrounded by nature and also a space that prioritizes your well-being and respect for the environment. With an outstanding A energy rating, our 16 chalets are designed to maximize efficiency, reduce your energy bills and minimize environmental impact, providing you with a space that is not only beautiful, but also environmentally friendly. Can you imagine waking up surrounded by the majesty of the mountains and at the same time enjoying the proximity to all urban amenities? Arroyo Homes makes it possible.Contact us now and make your dream of having a chalet that adapts to all stages of your life come true! With communal pool areas and garden areas.
address: Calle Encinas, Tilos y Sauces no number

description: Independent new construction villa that you can design to your liking and build according to your needs, of high quality and with high sustainability, located in the town of Guadalix de la Sierra (Madrid). Construction under a self-promotion regime with an advanced design, built in an "Architectural Concrete" structure with which we obtain clear advantages over traditional construction, since it considerably reduces execution times and costs, achieving a significant improvement in aspects related to impact environment that guarantees the highest energy rating (A). The house has a built area of 121m2, distributed over two floors, being able to choose between this villa or another with a different surface, where the price would be modified, and which is immersed in a 322m² plot.where you can enjoy garden areas or install a pool. The house has the following distribution, on the ground floor is the living room with kitchenette, a toilet, and the garage, and on the first floor there are 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. In addition, the price includes air conditioning by aerothermal energy with refreshing underfloor heating and the fencing of the plot. Items not included: Kitchen furniture and electrical appliances, registration of the building (declaration of new construction before a notary and subsequent registration in the Property Registry), and registration of definitive supplies. Guadalix de la Sierra is a municipality of Madrid located 49 kilometers from the capital.Located in the Sierra de Guadarrama and framed by small mountain formations, such as the Cerro de San Pedro and the Cancho de Pedrezuela.Its main river channel is the Guadalix River, whose waters have been dammed in the Pedrezuela reservoir.In addition, due to its location in the valley, it enjoys a characteristic microclimate, with not too cold winters and mild summers. The municipality has two bus lines 197C (Torrelaguna - Venturada - Cabanillas de la Sierra) and 726 (Madrid, Plaza Castilla - Guadalix de la Sierra - Navalafuente).In addition, in its immediate vicinity you can find supermarkets, a health center, a pharmacy, bars and restaurants, and a training offer with two nursery schools (one public and one private), a public school for infant and primary education, and a secondary and high school. TAXES NOT INCLUDED. WE PROCESS YOUR FINANCING for the acquisition of the home under the self-promotion regime, and we take you by the hand until the keys to the home are handed over. *The images are indicative and not contractual.

GUADALIX DE LA SIERRA Guadalix de la Sierra is a Spanish municipality in the province and Community of Madrid, 49 kilometers from Madrid capital in the Jarama river basin. Guadalix has abundant grasslands and tree specimens, water is also very present thanks to the Guadalix and Miraflores rivers, numerous streams and the Pedrezuela reservoir. In this municipality, one of the classics of Spanish cinema was filmed in 1953: ¡Bienvenido, Mister Marshall" directed by Luis García Berlanga and in which many of the residents of the municipality took part as extras. Guadalix de la Sierra has two bus lines: Line 197C: Torrelaguna - Redueña - Venturada - Guadalix de la Sierra - Navalafuente - Cabanillas de la Sierra Line 726: Madrid (Plaza de Castilla) - Colmenar Viejo - Soto del Real - Guadalix de la Sierra - Navalafuente For more information and visits contact: Enrique Vallinas Lazaro 608 48 19 56 Pablo Batres 619 43 47 38.
